sections.heading: Abolishment of Department of Natural Resources and Environment; Creation of Department of Natural Resources; Transfer of Natural Resources Commission From Department of Natural Resources and Environment to Department of Natural Resources by Type II Transfer; Appointment of Director of Department of
sections.text: Abolishment of Department of Natural Resources and Environment; Creation of Department of Natural Resources; Transfer of Natural Resources Commission From Department of Natural Resources and Environment to Department of Natural Resources by Type II Transfer; Appointment of Director of Department of Natural Resources by Governor; Transfer of Certain Powers and Duties From Department of Natural Resources and Environment to Department of Natural Resources by Type II Transfer; Transfer of Certain Commissions, Boards, and Authorities From Department of Natural Resources and Environment to Department of Natural Resources by Type I Transfer; Creation of Department of Environmental Quality; Appointment of Director of Department of Environmental Quality by Governor; Transfer of Certain Powers and Duties From Department of Natural Resources and Environment to Department of Environmental Quality by Type II Transfer; Transfer of Certain Offices and Authorities From Department of Natural Resources and Environment to Department of Environmental Quality by Type I Transfer; Effect of Executive Reorganization Order on Certain Public Acts.
